abstract: If elected to the board of Genzyme, Carl Icahn will work to help the company fix what is “broken,” according to proxy documents filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission, Reuters reported.
snippet: If elected to the board of Genzyme, Carl Icahn will work to help the company fix what is “broken,” according to proxy documents filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: If elected to the board of Genzyme, billionaire investor Carl Icahn will work to understand and help the company fix what is “broken,” according to proxy documents filed on Tuesday with the  Securities and Exchange Commission, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Icahn Plans to Fix What’s ‘Broken’ at Genzyme
